coref_content: 1 view comment the Commercial Bank of Ethiopia ( CBE ) be set to open 500 branch in the GTP ii period, Fana Broadcasting Corporate report. accord to Yisak Mengesha, Business Development Head at the Commercial Bank of Ethiopia ( CBE ), tell Ethiopian Press Agency that the Commercial Bank of Ethiopia ( CBE ) plan to open 100 branch a year. for the come five year the Commercial Bank of Ethiopia ( CBE ) plan to increase the number of branch to 1,470 and the Commercial Bank of Ethiopia ( CBE )'s client to 20 million, from 970 branch and 11 million client, Yisak Mengesha, Business Development Head at CBE add. the expansion of the Commercial Bank of Ethiopia ( CBE )'s service aim at develop the culture of saving and investment in Ethiopia, Yisak Mengesha, Business Development Head at CBE note. source : Fana Broadcasting Corporate vote for this article tag as : no tag for this article about the author : webby Z.

CBEs cumulative gross profits during GTP I reachs 42.8b Br..
Commercial Bank of Dubai shareholders reject $750m Tier 1 bondÂ plan.
With 109 new branches last year, CBE expanding at faster rate than any other bank in #Ethiopia.
Commercial Bank International plans to raise funds for expansion.
Read about trends in bank charters and branches on our On the Economy blog.
Bank charters and branches are both on the decline.
Banks closing branches as customers go digital: Banks have trimmed the number of physical branches in the past...
